mapper.sql: id_, room_id_, uid_, type_, content_, instant_
mapper.select: SELECT id_ FROM t_messages UNION SELECT 0 AS id_ ORDER BY id_ DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT m.id_ AS id, m.room_id_ AS roomID, m.uid_ AS uid, u.nickname_ AS sender, m.type_ AS type, m.content_ AS content, m.instant_ AS instant FROM t_messages AS m LEFT JOIN t_users AS u ON m.uid_ = u.uid_ WHERE m.room_id_ = #{roomID} ORDER BY m.instant_ DESC LIMIT 1
